spells.changes:
- New: Dispels all buffs on targets upon contact
- Removed: Silence effect after contact
- Removed: Slow effect within the wind field
spells.description:
Creates a Sandstorm around the caster, pushing all
enemies outside. Channels for 6s with +45% Damage
Resistance and control immunity. Enemies touching the
field take [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage,
Slowed by 60% for 4s and dispelled from all buffs. Also knocks them
back 11m from center. The Sandstorm applies 60% Slow.

spells.changes:
- New: Silence effect added
- Removed: Slow effect
spells.description:
Creates a circular storm field around the caster for 4s
when causing Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback). Deals
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to enemies in
field, inflicting Silence and a 40% chance to miss Basic
Attacks for 3s. (Cooldown: 20s)

After a brief charge-up, unleash a Frozen Maelstrom
forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage
to enemies in the area, applying Slow by 40%% and
reducing Attack Speed by 40%%, lasting 6s. The punch
also deals [Damage Rate: 300%] additional Magic
Damage to enemies directly in front and applies Frozen
for 3s.

Gains 25% Damage Resistance if damage is dealt within
5, lasts for 6s. When taking damage during this time,
sends forth freezing air in all directions, dealing
[Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage to targets within
range, reducing Attack Speed by 30% and Movement
Speed by 30% for 4s. Minimum interval of 1s. (Cooldown:
20s)

Sprays ooze for 4s, creating 4 ooze zones every second
that last 8.5s. Enemies in ooze zones are Slowed by 50%.
Enemies entering ooze zones gain [Acid Blast].

[Acid Blast]
Reduces Damage by 40% and cancels Stealth. Takes
[Damage Rate: 20%] Magic Damage every 1s per stack for
6s. Stacks up to 3 times.

After taking 5 instances of damage, releases acid
outward, dealing [Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to
enemies in range, reducing their damage dealt by 25% and
Movement Speed by 25% for 4s.

Leaps to the target location. Gains immunity to control
during leap. Deals[Damage Rate: 350%] Physical
Damage and knocks enemies in the area up for 1.5s.

When inflicting Immobilize or Hard Control (Stun, Fear,
Freeze, Knockup, Petrify), drops a meteor after 1s, dealing
480[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and 30% Slow
for 3s. (Cooldown: 5s)

Grants Shield of Conviction to up to 5 allies around the
caster for 6s. Allies with Shield of Conviction gain
[Target-based Max HP 30%] Shield effect, and 30% of
damage dealt will be converted into shield value, up to
[Target-based Max HP 15%] additional Shield. After 6s, if
the shield remains unbroken, deals [Damage Rate: 300%]
Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Subsequent
explosions deal reduced damage (15%).

Gains immunity to control effects and 20% Damage
Resistance whenever gaining shield for as long as the
shield remains. (Cooldown: 20s)

Channel for 6s, gaining immunity to control. Allies on the
field gain +40% Max HP and immunity to Forced
Movement (Pull, Knockback). Each 5000 total damage
taken by allies grants 1 Energy stack, up to 5.
Use again within 12s of starting the channeling to
unleash absorbed energy, dealing [Damage Rate:
350%]-[Damage Rate: 700%] Magic Damage based on
stacks and reducing Movement Speed by 30% for 4s.

Taking damage equal to 10% of Max HP within 5s after
skill cast grants 25% Damage Resistance for 6s. During
this time, reflect Magic Damage equal to 65% + 1.5% of
Max HP to the attacker. (Cooldown: 25s)

Channel for 4s with control immunity and 30% increased
Movement Speed. On hit, deals [Damage Rate: 215%]
Physical Damage and creates a chain link (max 5 chains).
Chains break at range limit. After the channeling ends,
pull all chained targets to deal [Damage Rate: 215%]
Physical Damage and Stun them for 1.5s.

When inflicting Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback) on
enemies, creates a circular prison lasting 4s. Enemies
touching the prison take [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic
Damage and are Immobilized until the prison ends
(Cooldown: 20s)

Creates a protection zone at the target location that
grants allies within +30% Damage Resistance, +40%
Healing Received, +40% Dodge and heals for 
[Healing Rate: 50%] HP every second. Then leaps to the target
location, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage
to those hit and knocking them up for 1s.
Immune to control during prep and leap.

Gains 25% Damage Resistance for 1s if HP is below 75%.
Sends healing radiation waves in all directions, healing
allies in range for [Healing Rate: 50%] HP and granting
[Target-based Max HP 5%] Shield every 1s for 4s.
(Cooldown: 20s)

spells.changes:
- Removed: Damage reduction against monsters
- Added: Magic Resistance increase during cannon form
spells.description:
Transform into a turret for 25s. Basic Attacks become
artillery strikes, firing projectiles at targets beyond 8m,
dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage.
Artillery Critical Damage is 150%.
 While in turret form gain increased Magic Resistance

While standing still, gain 1 stack of [Steadfast] every
second.
[Steadfast]: +2% Critical Rate, +1.5% damage for 3s.
Stacks up to 15 times

spells.changes: - Each Dark Energy Ball Damage Rate 30% -> 35%
spells.description:
Channel void energy for 5s and send forth 37 Void Orbs,
each dealing [Damage Rate: 35%] Magic Damage and
inflicting [Void Toxin]
Skill cannot be interrupted.
[Void Toxin]: Deals [Damage Rate: 10%] Magic Damage
every second (increases based on stacks) for 12s,
stacking up to 5 times. [Void Toxin] from different sources
share stacks.

Gains 5% Movement Speed for 3s when inflicting an
enemy with a DoT effect, stacking up to 6 times.

Links to 8 targets within 10m around the caster,
channeling for 4s. Restores [Healing Rate: 40%] HP to the
caster and linked allies every 0.5s, while dealing 
[Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to linked enemies.
Cannot be interrupted while channeling.
Other allies within 12m receive +20% healing.

Removes all control effects and gains [Submerge] for
2.5s
[Submerge]: Dives underground, becoming immune to all
damage and control effects. Increases Movement Speed
by 40% and recovers[Healing Rate: 49%] HP every
second.
Press skill again to exit [Submerge] early.
Upon exiting [Submerge], deals [Damage Rate: 200%]
Magic Damage to nearby enemies.
Can be used while skills are disabled

Dealing damage with a skill grants 1 stack of Swarm,
restoring [Healing Rate: 7.5%] HP every 2s for 6s
(stacks do not boost healing effect). During this time,
Damage Resistance increases by 5%, stacking up to 5
times. (Cooldown: 0.5s)

Applies Serpent's Whisper to the caster or an allied target,
preventing movement and skill usage for 4s and granting
immunity to damage and control. Deals [Damage Rate:
58%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies every 0.5s and
applies [Creeping Stone]
[Creeping Stone]: Lasts 1s, stacking up to 4 times. Target
is Petrified and has their Armor reduced by 25% for 2 at
max stacks (cannot gain [Creeping Stone] for 6)
Can be used while skills are disabled. Serpent's Whisper
cannot be dispelled.

Retains 1 HP upon taking lethal damage, transforming
into a spirit serpent, cleansing all negative effects
(control, DoT, and debuffs), gaining immunity to control,
debuffs and damage for 2s, and +100% Movement Speed,
and healing 5% HP every 0.5s. (CD: 120s)

Creates a Genetic Cascade link with the target, lasting
15s.
For allied targets: Restores [Healing Rate: 25%] HP every
second and increases damage dealt by 3% for 5s. Stacks
up to 10 times.
For enemy targets: Deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic
Damage every second and reduces damage dealt by 3%
for 5s. Stacks up to 10 times.
Can link to another target of a different type while a link is
active.
Link breaks if the target moves over 25m away.

After dealing damage 5 times, creates two Yin Vortexes
around the caster that deal [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic
Damage to enemies hit and reduce healing received by 5%
for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times. (Cooldown: 0.5s)
After healing 5 times, creates two Yang Vortexes around
self that restore [Healing Rate: 50%] HP to allies hit and
increase healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 3
times. (Cooldown: 0.5s)

Select an enemy target to summon ravens. After 2
seconds, ravens dive to attack, dealing [Damage Rate:
210%] Magic Damage to up to 10 enemies in range,
dispelling all buffs, shields, and HoT effects. Applies 50%
Slow and reduces damage dealt by 50% for 6s. Targets
cannot gain buffs, shields, or HoT effects during this time.

Skills dealing damage grant the caster Raven's Call. At 6
stacks, the next skill damage within 8s that hits an enemy
target will summon ravens at the location, dealing
[Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemy
targets in range. This effect removes 1 stack of buffs from
hit targets and restores [Healing Rate: 60%] HP to self.
(Trigger Interval: 0.5s)

Creates a Lunar Domain and channels for 8s. Enemies
within are struck by starlight on skill use, taking 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage and losing 20 MP. Allies
within recover 8 MP every second and gain 
[Target-based Max HP 15%] Shield lasting 4s.
Skill cannot be interrupted. +20% Movement Speed while
channeling.

Every 2s restores Moonveil Max MP + 3% MP to other
allies within 12m

spells.changes:
- Purifies Debuffs: 2 stacks -> All Dispel
- Removes DOT Purification Effect
spells.description:
Creates an expanding Sanctification Field at the target
location and channels for 5s.
Cannot be interrupted while channeling.
Cleanses control effects every 0.5s, all debuffs, and 2 DoT
effects, from up to 20 allies in the field and restores
[Healing Rate: 25%] HP.

When healing with skills, the target gains 5% additional
Damage Resistance for 4s. Stacks up to 6 times

spells.changes:
- Removed: Slow and Immobilize immunity effects
- Defined as a movement skill
- Added: Target cannot be teleported by Astral Gate for 10 seconds after teleportation
spells.description:
Creates an astral field beneath the caster. After 3s,
teleports up to 15 teammates in range to the target
location. Upon arrival, deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic
Damage to surrounding enemies and Stuns them for 1s.
Allies gain [Target-based Max HP 20%] Shield, +30%
Movement Speed effects for 4s.
If there's unpassable terrain in the teleportation path,
teleport to that position instead ..
 Target cannot be teleported by Astral Gate for 10 seconds after teleportation.

Reduces the cooldown of all skills (not including Tactical
Item skills) by 0.3s when this skill deals damage.
(Cooldown: 0.5s)
N/A
N/A

Activate an Electric Device for 8s.
Electric Device hits up to 5 enemies every 0.5s for
[Damage Rate: 40%] Physical Damage, reducing Armor by
8% for 8s. Stacks up to 10 times.

Basic Attacks grant 1 stack of Electric Charge. At 5
stacks, the next attack triggers EMP Blast dealing
[Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in
range.

Creates a void field lasting 8s that envelops the caster
and up to 5 enemies, dealing 192[Damage Rate: 50%]
Magic Damage to enemies within. Enemies in the void are
immune to Physical Damage, cannot perform basic
attacks, are slowed for 30%, and have their Magic
Resistance reduced by 30%. The caster can still perform
basic attacks and gain 35% Basic Attack Lifesteal, while
also ignoring the Physical Damage immunity of enemies
in the void.

spells.changes: - Original "Umbra Guard" removed, replaced with "Void Construct"
spells.description:
Converts Physical Damage from Basic Attacks into Magic Damage. Each
time an attack deals damage, it reduces the target's Magic Resistance by 4%, for 4s, stacking up
to 10.

spells.changes:
- Attack Speed Increase: 70% -> 55%
- This state cannot be dispelled
spells.description:
Removes all current shield values, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies, while
also gaining 55% Attack Speed, 30% Movement Speed,
and 30% Critical Rate, and becoming Immune to Control
Effects for 6s.
 Can't be dispelled.

While without Armor, gains 5 Energy per second, and
gains 5 Energy on Basic Attack Crit. When Energy reaches
100, restores [Target-based Max HP 15%] Armor.
While with Armor, gains [Target-based Max HP 3%] Armor
on Basic Attack Crit. Armor restored cannot exceed
[Target-based Max HP 25%]. (Trigger Interval: a cooldown
of 1 seconds)

Releases a Null Pulse in the target direction, dealing
 [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage to enemies in
range, knocking them back 12m, and applying Silence and
40% Slow for 3s.
Has a 35% chance to dodge Basic Attack damage.

Enters Stealth, gaining [Spectral Shield] and the ability
[Phantom Bind], lasting 9s.
Spectral Shield: Grants [Target-based Max HP 25%] shield
effect; if the Spectral Shield fades out, the Phantom Bind
effect ends prematurely.
Phantom Bind: Summon phantoms that track enemies in
range, dealing [Damage Rate: 183%] Magic Damage
and replenishing [Target-based Max HP 5%] Spectral
Shield.
Doesn't break Phantom Clone Stealth ..
Using any skill other than Phantom Bind, or dealing direct
healing or damage, reveals you for 2s before re-entering
Stealth.
Recovers 6% HP every 2s while in Stealth.

Enters Stealth when standing still unhurt and not using
skills for a short duration. Damage, skills, or movement
breaks Stealth.
Warning when enemies are 7-14m away. Stealth breaks
after 3s within 7m.
Recovers 6% HP every 2s while in Stealth

Creates a field around the caster, lasting 20s. Then
scatter 8 Shadow Clones, each dealing [Damage Rate:
200%] Physical Damage to those hit. Damage reduces to
15% for subsequent hits on the same target. While in the
field, skill changes to [Shadow Swap]. Touching a
Shadow Clone reduces Shadow Swap's cooldown by 5s,
grants [Target-based Max HP 10%] Shield and +20%
Movement Speed for 4s.
Field disappears when leaving range.
[Shadow Swap]: Dash forward and increase the Attack
Speed of the next 5 basic attacks within 6s by 60%.

Grants Basic Attacks a 30% chance to trigger a shadow
strike for 6s, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical
Damage (Cooldown: 0.8s).
Basic Attack Damage Bonuses affect damage and basic
attack critical hits can cause the damage to crit.

spells.changes:
- Damage Type: Physical Damage -> Magic Damage
- Lifesteal Ratio Against Monsters: 60% -> 30%
spells.description:
Activates Crimson Vortex for 6s.
Crimson Vortex deals [Damage Rate: 75%] Magical Damage to up to 5 enemies every second, healing the caster for 60% of damage dealt against players,
 30% versus monsters.
Damage increases up to [Damage Rate: 150%] as HP drops.
Gains +4% Damage Resistance and +6% Attack Speed for every 10% HP lost.

On Critical Hit, deals [Damage Rate: 70%] Physical
Damage to nearby enemies, while also reducing their
Armor by 15% for 4s. (Cooldown: 1.3s)

Creates a Spectral Disguise granting Stealth to the caster
and up to 15 nearby allies, increasing Damage Resistance
by 25% for 8s
Using a skill, dealing damage or inflicting healing breaks
Stealth for 4s before reapplying

Skill and Basic Attack hits from the rear deal 
[Damage Rate: 60%] additional Physical Damage (Cooldown: 0.3s).
Basic Attack Damage Bonuses affect damage and basic
attack critical hits can cause the damage to crit.
